description:
We learn about how Mom and Dad met in a jungle in Thailand, they go to a ramen shop with their kids, and dad makes Fumi promise to never leave and stay with him forever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m going back / To start out with... / She`s good / Together
オレは帰るぜ / そもそもね / うまいぞ / いっしょ
